# Gaknulak
## Overview
Name: Gaknulak

Gender: m

Rank: Demigod

Alignment: LE

Origin of Worship: Kobold

Core Worshippers: Kobolds

Favored Weapon(s): Battleaxe (m)

Other Preferred Weapons:
